title: Analyzing the NBA Draft Through the Lens of the Finals | The Corner 3
description:
We briefly go over Thursday night’s NBA Finals Game 1 and look forward to what adjustments the Warriors can make in the face of a 1-0 deficit (1:46). Then, we hand out awards to the draft prospects who most closely mirror the roles that Finals participants like Pascal Siakam and Andre Iguodala are filling for their teams (15:00).

Hosts: Kevin O’Connor and Danny Chau

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
